John Salmons

Pronunciation: \SAL-mons\

John Rashall Salmons

(Buck)

Position: Shooting Guard, Small Forward, and Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-6, 207lb (198cm, 93kg)

Born: December 12, 1979 in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania us

College: Miami (FL)

High School: Plymouth-Whitemarsh in Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania

Recruiting Rank: 1998 (82)

Draft: San Antonio Spurs, 1st round (26th pick, 26th overall), 2002 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 29, 2002

Career Length: 13 years
